downloadTitle: How OneDrive for Business sync works
downloadDescription: This poster explains the synchronization steps a file goes through when it passes though OneDrive for Business sync client.
detailsSection: This poster explains the synchronization steps a file goes through when it passes though OneDrive for Business sync client.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is an Adobe Reader file. Users who do not have Adobe Reader can download it from Adobe.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: plan for social computing and collaboration in SharePoint Server 2013
